subtitle: You can serve this plain or add your preferred filling - such as grated cheese.

method.text: Heat a 15 - 18 cm omelette pan over a very gentle heat.
Beat the eggs, water and seasoning together until the eggs have just been mixed. Stir in the tomato puree and basil.
Put the butter or margarine in the pan until it just sizzles and pour in the egg mixture.
With a spatula or fork gently draw the mixture from the sides to the middle of the pan, allowing the uncooked egg to run to base of the pan and set.
When the base is firm and light golden brown, the top should be like soft scrambled egg.
Serve plain or add your chosen prepared filling and fold over. Serve hot.

title: Tomato omelette
